content:
# I've successfully gathered 10 iron ore! My inventory now contains:
# - 10 Coal
# - 5 Stone
# - 10 Iron Ore

# Now that I have the necessary materials, I can proceed to fuel the stone furnace and start smelting the iron ore into iron plates.

# First, I will add the coal to the stone furnace as fuel.
add_fuel_to_entity('stone-furnace', 'coal', quantity=10)  # Add 10 coal to the stone furnace for fuel.
print(f"Furnace status: {inspect_entity('stone-furnace')}")  # Check the status of the furnace after adding fuel.
